ygData.subject: Re: Hello everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for your replies and advice. My ranger is now level 16, hunting crocs at oasis mainly, and soooo looking forward to dual wield. I have a silvery war
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for your replies and advice. My ranger is now level 16,
hunting crocs at oasis mainly, and soooo looking forward to dual
wield. I have a silvery war axe, and a gnoll hide lariat for use in
offhand (I hope the low delay will mean fast skill increases). I am
currently building my 2HS skill to max (nearly there now) with an axe
of the iron back, which I love.

My guild is presumably called the Fremen because its founder was a
Frank Herbert fan. Anyway, the desert of Oasis seems eminently suited
to the guild, but they are all in the US, and grouping with them
means sleepless nights. For your information, the guild is very new,
mainly lower level players and very friendly and helpful where
possible. Of course, it lacks the resources of an old, high-level
guild, but I didn't join to get twinked or power-levelled anyway.

Thanks and best wishes,

Liz
